title: Classic All Natural Cocoa
description: Smooth and velvety, Giving Bean Classic All Natural Cocoa mix will warm you up and satisfy your sweet tooth!
cleaned_text: No additives and all natural ingredients make this cocoa naturally delicious. Smooth and velvety, get ready for this to be your new favorite cocoa mix! Ingredients: Milk powder, raw cane sugar, Dutch cocoa (processed with alkali), natural flavoring, sea salt, guar gum *contains milk
